problem: Given X is the midpoint of TV. X is the midpoint of UW and TV . Complete the proof that VW∥TU . (Elements:  WX ,  △VWX ,  VW ,  ∠TXU ,  ∠TUX ,  TU ,  UX ,  ∠VXW ,  △TUX ,  TX ,  VX ,  ∠VWX , )
statement: X is the midpoint of UW
X is the midpoint of TV
reason: Converse of Alternate Interior Angles Theorem
